page.title: 12IN A PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content:
I go to Lamberhead Green Junior School. It is in Kershaw Street.My teacher is Mr. Morris.We start school at five to nine and finish at twenty five to four.We have two play-times and a dinner-time.Every day we do group work.Each table does a different piece of work.We do maths,English, science and social studies.On Thurs- days we have Mr. Roscoe for R.E.For maths we have boxes with different sets.When you finish a box,you go on to another.For English we have books with questions in.On Wednesdays we have Games.Boys have football and girls have netball or rounders.Every year we have a sports day when every house (Danes,Saxons,Normans,Romans) race against each other.
{(VIEW OF SCHOOL LIFE EXPRESSED BY {ANDREA BLINSTON,AGED 11) }
